ID |blank1_info = 1267295 |website = |footnotes = }} Bridgewater is a city in the eastern part of the U.S. state of South Dakota. It is located in McCook County, and 511 people lived there at the 2020 census. Bridgewater became a city in 1889. ==References== ==Other websites== *City of Bridgewater website Category:Cities in South Dakota Category:1889 establishments in South Dakota
